posts.name: Hope Solo
posts.description: Another win for the USWNT! Next Friday we head to England to compete for the CONCAFF Championship. Send the team some good vibes.

pastPosts.name: Jessica Cho
pastPosts.description: Interviewed for google today! It wasn't as bad as other people had mentioned it to be. There were 4 rounds of interviews, 50 minutes long with a provided lunch. They asked me some questions on Javascript/JSON as well as UI questions. Good thing I learned all about it during my Intro to HCI design class at UCSD! :)

pastPosts.name: Kenia Duque
pastPosts.description: Was lucky enough to go to the 57th Annual Grammy Awards today! I was surprised to see that the Electric Light Orchestra performed one of my favorite songs. I sat next to Pharrell Williams!!! He was a lot more down to earth than I had expected.
